name: All We Need (peace)
description: Inspired by the Indigenous tribes of the Omo Valley region in Ethiopia, this illustration is the artwork for a song I did with an artist AfriKing. The work focuses on the conflict a lot of these groups face on a daily trying to live a life of peace. Rivalries with neighbouring tribes, drought and being forced from their lands are just a few of their issues. Collectors of this objkt will receive the mp3 file of the song.
